attributes.action: Create a law in order to give all domestic animals same rights as humans.
attributes.additional_details: I would love for United Kingdom to recognise the animal cruelty and the scale of cruelty it got to including illegal breading, neglecting, using them to fight against each other for sport...the list is never ending. It's time to considere all domestic animals as “living beings” instead of mere objects as it is the case now. The new law would include mistreatment of pets, and would also be regarded as a crime as if the owner had abused another person. Let's make a change and protect the innocent.
attributes.background: To give all domestic animals same legal status as humans to support animal rights and consider them as "living beings" to fight animal cruelty, neglect and give them rights they have never been given before.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561124
